title: [Valley of Gold]
description: Spreading out across the rest of the valley is a city of tents, hues of crimson to the west and sapphire to the east.  Trampled grass shows the large amount of people that passed this way.  Wagons filled with barrels of drink and crates of supplies can be seen traveling to one camp or the other.  The sounds of laughter, singing, and marching echo from both sides.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
